task.title: Maintaining Normal Radiator Operation
task.shortdesc: Keep the radiator properly filled and monitor its operation during challenging driving conditions.

taskbody.prereq: Check the radiator water level regularly, especially before long trips.
taskbody.context: Normal operation includes occasional boiling under demanding conditions.

step.cmd: Monitor radiator temperature during challenging conditions

ul.li: Climbing long hills in warm weather

step.cmd: Allow water temperature to reach near boiling point for optimal efficiency
step.info: The engine operates most efficiently at higher water temperatures.
